        Great Food

        The Chef is the owner of the reataurant. Old tradition. Pork Ribs are superb. It is open for lunch and dinner. Sometimes difficult to get a seat . Does not accept credit cards .

        Thank 513isaach
        Tami T
        Kirchheim bei Munich, Germany
        94
        Reviewed September 4, 2014 via mobile
        Dining in as in your own house

        We we eat case molina with our friends from Columbia. We ordered the short menu. You don't know what you get- the chef decides the order of your courses. We were first a bit sceptisw of that concept but then it was pretty good. For...More

        Thank Tami T
